jobs.job_experience: 2+ years of relevant industry experience in Android development.
jobs.job_responsibilities: Conduct in-depth reviews of codebases to ensure maintainability, scalability, and adherence to clean architecture principles.
jobs.job_requirements: B.E./B. Tech/M.S./M. Tech in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
jobs.job_overview: We are hiring an Android Analyst with a unique focus on code quality, documentation, QA, refactoring, and code comprehension. This role is ideal for candidates who enjoy analyzing code, ensuring technical excellence, best practices in development, and supporting developer teams through structured reviews and process improvements.
